pageContext.claim: “Twenty-five thousand ballots in Pennsylvania were requested by nursing home residents, all in a single giant batch, not legal, indicating an enormous, illegal ballot harvesting operation. You're not allowed to do it, it's against the law.”
pageContext.analysis: Ballot harvesting is illegal in most cases in Pennsylvania, unless someone is disabled, but this claim of 25,000 ballots was never proven. This was a claim made by Sen. Lindsey Graham (R-S.C.), who said in early November is claim was examined but he did not provide evidence to substantiate it.
